titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MATERNITY CARE SETTING (AT START OF INTRAPARTUM CARE) - Description

div.p: MATERNITY CARE SETTING (AT START OF INTRAPARTUM CARE) is the same as attribute MATERNITY CARE SETTING.

MATERNITY CARE SETTING (AT START OF INTRAPARTUM CARE) is the mother's actual LOCATION at the start of intrapartum care, i.e. at the point where the mother is actively starting to receive care from Maternity Services for the Labour and Delivery.
